product_name: TYR Swimple Metallized Swim Goggles - Kids'
long_description: The TYR Swimple metallized swim goggles for kids reflect light, reduce glare and enhance peripheral vision. A quick-release button makes it easy for children to adjust the headstrap on their own. Goggles sport a small, uni-body frame and provide a comfortable, secure fit on the face. Soft, hypoallergenic silicone gaskets help provide a watertight seal. Featuring optical-grade, polycarbonate lenses, the Tyr Swimple metallized swim goggles are antifog and UV protective.
short_description: The TYR Swimple metallized swim goggles for kids reflect light, reduce glare and enhance peripheral vision. A quick-release button makes it easy for children to adjust the headstrap on their own.
